=== In This Issue ===

=== General Community News ===

==== Ubuntu 17.10 (Artful Aardvark) released ====
On behalf of the release team, Adam Conrad announces the release of Ubuntu 17.10 (Artful Aardvark). He shares key features of this release, including a new 4.13-based kernel , GNOME3 and gnome-shell as the default desktop, and other updates in core packages. Ubuntu Links for downloading the release as well as the flavor releases are provided.
https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-announce/2017-October/000226.html
 
Interested in the flavors?  Release announcements for each as follows:
* Xubuntu 17.10 Released - https://xubuntu.org/news/xubuntu-17-10-release/
* Lubuntu 17.10 (Artful Aardvark) released - http://lubuntu.me/artful-released/
* Kubuntu 17.10 Artful Aardvark is released - https://kubuntu.org/news/kubuntu-17-10-artful-aardvark-is-released/
* Ubuntu MATE 17.10 - http://ubuntu-mate.org/blog/ubuntu-mate-artful-final-release/
* Ubuntu Budgie - https://ubuntubudgie.org/blog/2017/09/25/17-10-release-notes
 
This release was widely covered, the following is a collection of articles selected by our editors:
* Ubuntu 17.10 ISOs Officially Released - https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=news_item&px=Ubuntu-17.10-ISOs
* Ubuntu 17.10 Released: Most Exciting Ubuntu In Years - https://fosspost.org/news/ubuntu-17-10-released-exciting-ubuntu-years
* Xubuntu 17.10 Brings a Refreshed Xfce Experience and Latest Software Updates - http://news.softpedia.com/news/xubuntu-17-10-brings-a-refreshed-xfce-experience-and-latest-software-updates-518129.shtml
* Ubuntu Budgie 17.10 Releases with Budgie Desktop 10.4, Night Light and More - http://news.softpedia.com/news/ubuntu-budgie-17-10-releases-with-budgie-desktop-10-4-night-light-and-more-518131.shtml
* Ubuntu Drops Unity for GNOME in Artful Aardvark Release - http://www.eweek.com/enterprise-apps/ubuntu-drops-unity-for-gnome-in-artful-aardvark-release
* Ubuntu Linux will never be the same after version 17.10 - http://www.zdnet.com/article/ubuntu-linux-will-never-be-the-same-after-version-17-10/

=== The Planet ===

==== Didier Roche: Ubuntu GNOME Shell in Artful (Continued) ====
Didier Roche from the Desktop Team in a series of daily blog posts describes the process of making Ubuntu GNOME Shell ready for Artful Aardvark 17.10. The desired result contains both a default Ubuntu session experience avoiding any shock for those updating from Unity 7, and the choice of a more generic GNOME session
* Didier Roche: Ubuntu GNOME Shell in Artful: Day 16 - https://didrocks.fr/2017/10/18/ubuntu-gnome-shell-in-artful-day-16/
